raw_comment: In these four graphs presented to us I notice the differences in exports and imports of Electricity generation. Notice how each Nuclear energy is at the top of each graph and coal is at the least amount. I wonder if these countries partnered up, would the exports and imports double to produce for both countries, or would it decrease due to the fact of it being harder to produce and keep stable for two countries. Well I live in the United States so this tells me were only making enough in my country just to get by for 330 million people, this also tells me our environment is being harmed in the process of creating these oils. My headline would be: Differences in Countries' Electricity.
ace_sentences: Four graphs are presented to us.
The graphs show exports of electricity generation.
The graphs show imports of electricity generation.
I notice differences between exports and imports in the graphs.
In each graph, nuclear energy is at the top.
In each graph, coal is at the least amount.
I wonder if these countries partner up.
If these countries partner up, then exports and imports might double.
If these countries partner up, then exports and imports might decrease.
It might be harder to produce electricity for two countries.
It might be harder to keep electricity generation stable for two countries.
I live in the United States.
The United States has 330 million people.
The United States makes only enough electricity for its people.
The environment is harmed by creating oils.
The headline is: Differences in Countries' Electricity.
